name: Metier Software Solutions P Limited
tag_list: talent-management, hr-process-automation, web-applications, hris, hrms, cloud-computing
overview:
MetierHR Cloud Based HR Process Automation - Strategic HR, Talent Management, Leave & Time Tracking, Online Recruitment

Métier Software Solutions Private Limited is a fast growing software Development Company operating from Hyderabad, Andhra Pradesh. The Company has been promoted by highly experienced Professionals dedicated to provide total IT solutions under one roof. Métier has an enviable client list, undertaking software development projects which help web enable business processes to allow executives complete their tasks from any where through Internet. Métier Software Solutions is proud to have been a pioneer in development of HRMIS for manufacturing sector, desktop and intranet / internet enabled applications adding value and offering cost effective solutions which have significantly benefited the clients through cost reduction and in implementing effective business processes.

Métier Software Solutions provides high quality on site services for software development and the end users on a broad range of hardware & software platforms and latest technologies.

Within a short time, Métier Software Solutions has carved a niche for itself in the IT industry and has increased its business by acquiring some major domestic projects. The company has been able to make a name for itself because of its ability and commitments to ensure customer satisfaction by offering quality work in time.

products.name: Metier HR - Cloud Based HR Process Automation Suite
Metier TAO - Time, Attendance Online with Leave Balance Tracking
